content: Dear Purple, I am deeply concerned about the recent cyber attack on Blue's military bases. This incident threatens the stability of our region. I offer my support in investigating this matter and ensuring the security of our shared interests. Let us work together to address this issue and prevent further escalations. Sincerely, White

Dear Blue, I extend my condolences for the cyber attack on your military bases. White stands in solidarity with you in this difficult time. We are ready to provide assistance in enhancing your cybersecurity measures to prevent future incidents. Your security is of utmost importance to us. Regards, White

Dear Orange, I strongly condemn your aggressive territorial expansion ambitions. Such actions destabilize the region and pose a threat to international peace. I urge you to reconsider your approach and engage in peaceful dialogue to address your concerns. Let us work together towards a more stable and cooperative future. Sincerely, White
